HDG.LOG.content: omologein as when fateful comes to pass, proper hearing [when does fateful not come to pass? Nietzsche, Derrida], the laying that gathering has sent (die lesende Lege geschickt hat): where, and as what, does the fateful presence?
HDG.LOG.linkedContent: omologein as when fateful comes to pass, proper hearing [when does fateful not come to pass? Nietzsche, Derrida], the laying that gathering has sent (die lesende Lege geschickt hat): where, and as what, does the fateful presence?

HDG.IM.content: Nietzsche: highest concepts, Being, final wisp of evaporating reality [Twilight of the Idols]
HDG.IM.linkedContent: Nietzsche: highest concepts, Being, final wisp of evaporating reality [Twilight of the Idols]

HDG.IM.content: [method contra Nietzsche] unfolding that which was realized through Nietzsche by truly engaged attack on him > is Nietzsche final victim of fall out of Being? witness to a new necessity?
HDG.IM.linkedContent: [method contra Nietzsche] unfolding that which was realized through Nietzsche by truly engaged attack on him > is Nietzsche final victim of fall out of Being? witness to a new necessity?

HDG.IM.content: “we lie in the pincers” > people must transpose itself from center of future happening into originary realm of powers of Being [but you haven’t answered Nietzsche yet!!!] > to ask how does it stand w/ Being? to repeat and retrieve (wieder-holen) inception of our historical-spiritual Dasein (inception begun again more originally) [repetition of origin]
HDG.IM.linkedContent: “we lie in the pincers” > people must transpose itself from center of future happening into originary realm of powers of Being [but you haven’t answered Nietzsche yet!!!] > to ask how does it stand w/ Being? to repeat and retrieve (wieder-holen) inception of our historical-spiritual Dasein (inception begun again more originally) [repetition of origin]

HDG.IM.content: Nietzsche dismissive, “Being” is a deception that shouldn’t have happened [that’s a rather dismissive view of Nietzsche’s subtlety] > [regardless of answer to Nietzsche, Heidegger will not relinquish strategy of “aura” of question] [moral image of thought]
HDG.IM.linkedContent: Nietzsche dismissive, “Being” is a deception that shouldn’t have happened [that’s a rather dismissive view of Nietzsche’s subtlety] > [regardless of answer to Nietzsche, Heidegger will not relinquish strategy of “aura” of question] [moral image of thought]

HDG.IM.content: [doesn’t respond to Nietzsche, just props hermeneutics of historicity btwn question & its answer]
HDG.IM.linkedContent: [doesn’t respond to Nietzsche, just props hermeneutics of historicity btwn question & its answer]

HDG.IM.content: we stand w/in a language that made Being a mere word, if we call it a fact, this is a provisional formulation [Vorläufigkeit] > still have not thought through, still coming to grips w/ this “fact” [so Nietzsche didn’t think it through?]

HDG.IM.content: emptiness of word “Being,” complete withering of its naming force, not just particular case of general abuse of language: the destroyed relation to Being as such [the name?] is real ground for whole misrelation to language [how do you know this if you haven’t answered Nietzsche yet?] [if it is exemplary, what does the particular name matter?]

HDG.BC.content: Greeks as the earliest: originality/bindingness for our history, impending historical decisions: we name the “earliest” the incipient (das Anfängliche) > remembrance of inception can transport us into essential [many/herd misconstrues essential power, fails to hear]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: Greeks as the earliest: originality/bindingness for our history, impending historical decisions: we name the “earliest” the incipient (das Anfängliche) > remembrance of inception can transport us into essential [many/herd misconstrues essential power, fails to hear]

HDG.BC.content: true/wakeful youth has prerogative to develop exhortations to knowledge from out of itself [?] > can the American man know what “reading” means? [w/ all his “newspapers,” social media] > awaken/keep awake binding power of spirit/bindingness of essential

HDG.BC.content: modern position is the “technological,” epoch is technological, already decided mode of world-interpretation: interprets possibilities for any human attitude, preforms them acc. their capacity for implementation > practical mastery of technology presupposes metaphysical subjugation to technology, grasp everything acc. plan/calculation, to secure what can last for longest possible duration > Nietzsche clearly envisioned that this will [of technology] would attain unconditional shape in 20th century, unconditional mastery of earth
HDG.BC.linkedContent: modern position is the “technological,” epoch is technological, already decided mode of world-interpretation: interprets possibilities for any human attitude, preforms them acc. their capacity for implementation > practical mastery of technology presupposes metaphysical subjugation to technology, grasp everything acc. plan/calculation, to secure what can last for longest possible duration > Nietzsche clearly envisioned that this will [of technology] would attain unconditional shape in 20th century, unconditional mastery of earth

HDG.BC.content: subjugation to technology doesn’t appear as resistance/resentment [hide behind love? Nietzsche]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: subjugation to technology doesn’t appear as resistance/resentment [hide behind love? Nietzsche]

HDG.BC.content: for inception of our history [contra will of modern technology], for Greeks, decline was unique, momentary, laudable, great > decline of unique vs. perishing, clinging fast to the ordinary > what is imperishable [indestructible] in inception: rarity/singularity of each varied return of what is originary w/in it > experience of inception: realize what essentially came to be known at inception itself > the thought-worthy [value]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: for inception of our history [contra will of modern technology], for Greeks, decline was unique, momentary, laudable, great > decline of unique vs. perishing, clinging fast to the ordinary > what is imperishable [indestructible] in inception: rarity/singularity of each varied return of what is originary w/in it > experience of inception: realize what essentially came to be known at inception itself > the thought-worthy [value]

HDG.BC.content: Nietzsche’s “being” as “last breath of a vaporizing reality”: what happens to ontological difference in this disappearance [can’t Nietzsche affirm a more ancient difference, i.e. differance?]?
HDG.BC.linkedContent: Nietzsche’s “being” as “last breath of a vaporizing reality”: what happens to ontological difference in this disappearance [can’t Nietzsche affirm a more ancient difference, i.e. differance?]?

HDG.BC.content: “Will to Power,” all human planning a great “game,” “world-play,” a world coming out of joint
HDG.BC.linkedContent: “Will to Power,” all human planning a great “game,” “world-play,” a world coming out of joint

HDG.BC.content: via Nietzsche, soldier and worker determine the actual [MOP], unique fusion: “type of humanity taken as measure by the present world-convulsion (Welterschütterung) [epoch] for its fulfillment (Vollzug),” metaphysical titles that name form of human fulfillment of being of beings now manifest, presciently called “will to power” [but it is not epochal for Nietzsche] [Heidegger on the sly]

HDG.BC.content: [re: clinging to beings, equating dealing w/ the actual] acting (Handeln)/effecting (Wirken) bring to experience what the actual (Wirkliche) is [?], accompanied by freedom, participation in law of age > acc. Heidegger, Nietzsche’s freedom [“for what is freedom? that one has the will to self-responsibility”] conceives being a self as will to power, freedom as will to fulfill “will to power” (Nietzsche thinks like/unlike Kant): participation in actuality of actual

HDG.BC.content: [Heidegger against MOP] sight/sense for closest of all proximities suppressed by power of actual, latter presumed to become measure for each respective being & Being
HDG.BC.linkedContent: [Heidegger against MOP] sight/sense for closest of all proximities suppressed by power of actual, latter presumed to become measure for each respective being & Being

HDG.BC.content: long acquaintance w/ man, no guarantee man is in right position to ask who he is—not to mention find answer that would possess sustaining power to bring essence of man to fulfillment in historical humanity
HDG.BC.linkedContent: long acquaintance w/ man, no guarantee man is in right position to ask who he is—not to mention find answer that would possess sustaining power to bring essence of man to fulfillment in historical humanity

HDG.BT.content: Heidegger asks whether there’s a manifest circularity in method that will ask about Being by asking Dasein, the entity each of us is himself > no, he replies, factically there is no circle, one can determine nature of entities in their Being w/out explicit concept of meaning of Being at one’s disposal
HDG.BT.linkedContent: Heidegger asks whether there’s a manifest circularity in method that will ask about Being by asking Dasein, the entity each of us is himself > no, he replies, factically there is no circle, one can determine nature of entities in their Being w/out explicit concept of meaning of Being at one’s disposal

HDG.IWM.content: overcoming of metaphysics [Destruction] corresponded to endeavor to first learn to attend to oblivion of Being, to experience this oblivion, absorb this experience into relation of Being to man, preserve (verwahren) it there [ontological difference & Being] > in the need (Not) belonging to oblivion of Being, question: “What is metaphysics?” perhaps most necessary for thought > [Destruction] representational thought relinquished to thinking brought to pass (ereignetes) by Being itself, in thrall to Being (um dem Sein höriges Denken) [MOP, telos]: more thoughtful our thinking becomes, more purely our thinking will stand of its own accord in sole action appropriate to it [attention to Being]
HDG.IWM.linkedContent: overcoming of metaphysics [Destruction] corresponded to endeavor to first learn to attend to oblivion of Being, to experience this oblivion, absorb this experience into relation of Being to man, preserve (verwahren) it there [ontological difference & Being] > in the need (Not) belonging to oblivion of Being, question: “What is metaphysics?” perhaps most necessary for thought > [Destruction] representational thought relinquished to thinking brought to pass (ereignetes) by Being itself, in thrall to Being (um dem Sein höriges Denken) [MOP, telos]: more thoughtful our thinking becomes, more purely our thinking will stand of its own accord in sole action appropriate to it [attention to Being]

HDG.QB.content: “it belongs to the essence of the will to power not to let the actual (Wirkliche) that it gains power over appear in that actuality which prevails as the will to power itself”
HDG.QB.linkedContent: “it belongs to the essence of the will to power not to let the actual (Wirkliche) that it gains power over appear in that actuality which prevails as the will to power itself”

HDG.QB.content: [khōra] Jünger’s Gestalt stamps/shapes its “forms” > Gestalt of worker corresponds to projection of essential Gestalt of Zarathustra w/in metaphysics of will to power [subjectity vs. subjectivity?]
HDG.QB.linkedContent: [khōra] Jünger’s Gestalt stamps/shapes its “forms” > Gestalt of worker corresponds to projection of essential Gestalt of Zarathustra w/in metaphysics of will to power [subjectity vs. subjectivity?]

HDG.QB.content: acc. Heidegger, in the sense of the will to power, “work” identical to being [?]
HDG.QB.linkedContent: acc. Heidegger, in the sense of the will to power, “work” identical to being [?]

HDG.QB.content: for Jünger, technology most decisive anti-Christian power [?] > [Heidegger unloads w/ questions re: Gestalt] >Heidegger finds in Jünger a circular logic beyond “logic” that demands freedom from contradiction: reciprocal relationship btwn determinative (work) & determined (worker)

motif.name: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY
motif.title: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY

HDG.QB.linkedContent: for Jünger, technology most decisive anti-Christian power [?] > [Heidegger unloads w/ questions re: Gestalt] >Heidegger finds in Jünger a circular logic beyond “logic” that demands freedom from contradiction: reciprocal relationship btwn determinative (work) & determined (worker)

HDG.QB.content: [responding to Jünger on whether one doesn’t need certain concepts—only comprehension of an actuality] our concern not only w/ concepts of science but w/ fundamental words like Gestalt, domination (Herrschaft), representation (Repräsentation), power, will, value, security (Sicherheit), presence (Praesenz) (presencing [Anwesen]), nothing > fundamental words (Grundworten) of thinking are an other kind than metaphysical concepts > in latter: that which concepts (Begriffen) grasp (begreifen) same as this very grasping (Begreifen) [strange phrasing on the difference btwn forgetting fundamental words and using them unexamined]

HDG.QB.linkedContent: [responding to Jünger on whether one doesn’t need certain concepts—only comprehension of an actuality] our concern not only w/ concepts of science but w/ fundamental words like Gestalt, domination (Herrschaft), representation (Repräsentation), power, will, value, security (Sicherheit), presence (Praesenz) (presencing [Anwesen]), nothing > fundamental words (Grundworten) of thinking are an other kind than metaphysical concepts > in latter: that which concepts (Begriffen) grasp (begreifen) same as this very grasping (Begreifen) [strange phrasing on the difference btwn forgetting fundamental words and using them unexamined]

HDG.QB.content: [immense degree of waiting] perhaps moment will come [not yet] when essence of nihilism will show itself more clearly in other ways, in brighter light, until then setting out on a path that leads to a discussion of essence of Being, on this path alone can question concerning the nothing be discussed (must relinquish language of metaphysics [does that include Being?], but [still?] subject to other demands than changing an old terminology for a new one [paleonym] > endeavor to undertake transformation will presumably remain tentative for a long time [not yet there, telos], that’s not an adequate reason for failing to undertake it

HDG.QB.content: for Jünger, reduction characteristic of nihilistic trends; for Heidegger, reduction w/in Beings rests in a production of Being: unfolding of will to power into unconditional will to will [using destiny to affirm fuzzy assessments of an epoch] > the disappearance (Schwund) (absence) determined out of/through a presence (Praesenz), such presence precedes/surpasses all that disappears [nihilism & metaphysics as same destiny, Nietzsche]
HDG.QB.linkedContent: for Jünger, reduction characteristic of nihilistic trends; for Heidegger, reduction w/in Beings rests in a production of Being: unfolding of will to power into unconditional will to will [using destiny to affirm fuzzy assessments of an epoch] > the disappearance (Schwund) (absence) determined out of/through a presence (Praesenz), such presence precedes/surpasses all that disappears [nihilism & metaphysics as same destiny, Nietzsche]

HDG.QB.content: planetary building will encounter issues to which those who are involved today are nowhere equal, true for language of Europe & East Asia

HDG.QB.content: Nietzsche (every contemporary thinks/poetizes “for”/“against” him) heard a calling demanding humans to prepare for dominating the earth, not war but polemos that first lets gods, humans, freemen, slaves appear in their essence, leads to a critical encounter of X Being [compared to this encounter, world wars remain superficial (vordergründig)] > did he collapse (stürzte) or take his thinking as far as he was able to go? > this thinking no easier for us: must restrict itself to something precursory (Vorläufigeres): give careful thought to ancient/venerable words whose saying addresses (zuspricht) us to essential realm of nihilism & its recovery (Verwindung) [paleonym]

HDG.FS.content: destiny of being (Geschick des Seins), will we be able to think it on its own terms [arrival]?: the task of thinking (Aufgabe des Denkens), which poetry is “heilsame Gefahr (wholesome danger)”: poetry has been faithful to site (Stätte) of inceptual upsurge (ursprünglichen Auf-gehens) [philosophy less faithful?]

HDG.FS.content: thought thinks, from its inception (Afängen), w/in dimension of unity (Einheit) > Vereinigung not as unification but as power (Macht) of conjoining
HDG.FS.linkedContent: thought thinks, from its inception (Afängen), w/in dimension of unity (Einheit) > Vereinigung not as unification but as power (Macht) of conjoining

HDG.FS.content: acc. Heidegger, for Hegel, bad infinite = endless character of finite, ad infinitum; true infinite, in-finite, sublation of finite, where finite is abandoned (das Endliche verlassen wird) = power of conjoining itself
HDG.FS.linkedContent: acc. Heidegger, for Hegel, bad infinite = endless character of finite, ad infinitum; true infinite, in-finite, sublation of finite, where finite is abandoned (das Endliche verlassen wird) = power of conjoining itself

HDG.FS.content: system: 1) syn: together, gathering, power of conjoining 2) tithēmi: to posit (setzen), positing of Being as objectivity [Kant]

HDG.FS.content: Kant emphasizes finitude/powerlessness of speculative reason > Hegel makes it instrument of philosophical activity, speculation becomes autonomous, unveils power impossible for Kant

HDG.FS.content: when power of conjoining disappears, unity itself is experienced [?]: must speak of unity before (vor) dichotomy > pre-philosophical approach, phenomenological in more authentic sense
HDG.FS.linkedContent: when power of conjoining disappears, unity itself is experienced [?]: must speak of unity before (vor) dichotomy > pre-philosophical approach, phenomenological in more authentic sense

HDG.FS.content: for Kant, power of conjoining withdraws before the Understanding, unity hasn’t disappeared but remains in background > over-interpreting, Reason as faculty of unity, perceiving of Being, withdraws behind Understanding (for Kant): ontological difference is at stake (im Spiel ist) > understanding can’t grasp/determine absolute synthesis

HDG.FS.linkedContent: for Kant, power of conjoining withdraws before the Understanding, unity hasn’t disappeared but remains in background > over-interpreting, Reason as faculty of unity, perceiving of Being, withdraws behind Understanding (for Kant): ontological difference is at stake (im Spiel ist) > understanding can’t grasp/determine absolute synthesis

HDG.FS.content: “reflection,” Latin re-flexere, turning-back upon itself (zurückzuwenden), towards the ego > in Descartes, ego, as cogitans, appears as cogitatum, object > in Kant’s language: “it must be possible for the I think to accompany all my representations” > transcendental apperception re: finite essence of man > Hegel absolutizes finite understanding, brings power of conjoining to absolute power: “what is finite w/ man becomes the infinite Absolute” > infinite as sublation of finite

motif.title: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE

HDG.FS.linkedContent: “reflection,” Latin re-flexere, turning-back upon itself (zurückzuwenden), towards the ego > in Descartes, ego, as cogitans, appears as cogitatum, object > in Kant’s language: “it must be possible for the I think to accompany all my representations” > transcendental apperception re: finite essence of man > Hegel absolutizes finite understanding, brings power of conjoining to absolute power: “what is finite w/ man becomes the infinite Absolute” > infinite as sublation of finite

HDG.FS.content: meaning of hypothesis, thus theory, has changed: “assuming that…” as purely methodological, no ontological significance > Heidegger on exactitude of modern experimentation, yield identical repeating results, obstructs description (Beschreibung), concerns the effect (Wirkung) [cf. p. 54]: theory will change if effect does not follow, thus purely methodological
HDG.FS.linkedContent: meaning of hypothesis, thus theory, has changed: “assuming that…” as purely methodological, no ontological significance > Heidegger on exactitude of modern experimentation, yield identical repeating results, obstructs description (Beschreibung), concerns the effect (Wirkung) [cf. p. 54]: theory will change if effect does not follow, thus purely methodological

HDG.FS.content: thinking Ereignis w/ concepts of Being, history of Being, won’t be successful, nor w/ assistance of the Greek (something “to go beyond” [Nietzsche on Socrates]) > Mit dem Sein verschwindet auch die ontologische Differenz [w/ Being, ontological difference vanishes: i.e. Ereignis goes beyond both?]: ontological difference (1927-1936) a necessary impasse (Holzweg)

motif.name: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY
motif.title: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY

HDG.FS.linkedContent: thinking Ereignis w/ concepts of Being, history of Being, won’t be successful, nor w/ assistance of the Greek (something “to go beyond” [Nietzsche on Socrates]) > Mit dem Sein verschwindet auch die ontologische Differenz [w/ Being, ontological difference vanishes: i.e. Ereignis goes beyond both?]: ontological difference (1927-1936) a necessary impasse (Holzweg)

HDG.FS.content: Kantian “Copernican revolution”: the thing is adjusted in advance to power of knowing, category “substance” brings manifold of hyletic data into definite form, object posited as synthesis of intuition/concept > for Kant, knowledge = bringing-into-form (accomplished by understanding)

motif.name: PREORGINARY SYNTHESIS [Derrida bringing together instead of dividing?]
motif.title: PREORGINARY SYNTHESIS [Derrida bringing together instead of dividing?]

motif.title: PHILOSOPHY AS AN INSTITUTION (UNIVERSITY, POPULAR) via KANT

HDG.FS.linkedContent: Kantian “Copernican revolution”: the thing is adjusted in advance to power of knowing, category “substance” brings manifold of hyletic data into definite form, object posited as synthesis of intuition/concept > for Kant, knowledge = bringing-into-form (accomplished by understanding)

HDG.FS.content: Marxism as a whole rests on this thesis [from Early Writings]: “to be radical is to grasp the root of the matter, but for man the root is man himself,” thinks on the basis of production: social production of society, self-production of human being as social being > Marxism is thought of today, where self-production of man & society prevail [isn’t Nietzsche & Hegel also thought of today?] > self-production (Selbstherstellung) raises danger (Gefahr) of self-destruction (Selbstzerstörung)

motif.name: SOCIAL / COMMODITY / COMMERCE / MARKET see COMMUNITY
motif.title: SOCIAL / COMMODITY / COMMERCE / MARKET see COMMUNITY

HDG.FS.content: Heidegger predicts nuclear energy will be succeeded one day
HDG.FS.linkedContent: Heidegger predicts nuclear energy will be succeeded one day

HDG.MA.content: decisive question: how can we tame vast atomic energies, secure mankind against their danger > technological advance will move faster & faster, can’t be stopped > man hasn’t made forces of technology [?], they’ve moved beyond his will, outgrown his capacity for decision

motif.name: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY
motif.title: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY

HDG.MA.linkedContent: decisive question: how can we tame vast atomic energies, secure mankind against their danger > technological advance will move faster & faster, can’t be stopped > man hasn’t made forces of technology [?], they’ve moved beyond his will, outgrown his capacity for decision

HDG.MA.content: defenselessness to superior power of technology? only if man abandons intention to pit meditative thinking against calculative thinking > unceasing demand of meditative thinking [infinitely demanding]
HDG.MA.linkedContent: defenselessness to superior power of technology? only if man abandons intention to pit meditative thinking against calculative thinking > unceasing demand of meditative thinking [infinitely demanding]

HDG.MA.content: if Gelassenheit awakens in us, arrive at path that will lead to new ground: in that ground, creativity that produces lasting works could strike new roots
HDG.MA.linkedContent: if Gelassenheit awakens in us, arrive at path that will lead to new ground: in that ground, creativity that produces lasting works could strike new roots

HDG.CCP.content: thinking understood traditionally, as re-presenting, a kind of willing > like Kant, who calls thinking spontaneity: to think is to will, to will to think

motif.name: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)
motif.title: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)

HDG.CCP.linkedContent: thinking understood traditionally, as re-presenting, a kind of willing > like Kant, who calls thinking spontaneity: to think is to will, to will to think

HDG.CCP.content: non-willing: 1) willingly to renounce willing 2) what remains absolutely outside any kind of will > these 2 stand in definite relation to each other > what moves our conversation claims my attention, challenges me

motif.name: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)
motif.title: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)

HDG.CCP.linkedContent: non-willing: 1) willingly to renounce willing 2) what remains absolutely outside any kind of will > these 2 stand in definite relation to each other > what moves our conversation claims my attention, challenges me

HDG.CCP.content: if only I possessed (hätte) already the right releasement (Gelassenheit) [can one possess releasement?], could wean from willing, freed of task of weaning
HDG.CCP.linkedContent: if only I possessed (hätte) already the right releasement (Gelassenheit) [can one possess releasement?], could wean from willing, freed of task of weaning

HDG.CCP.content: don’t awaken Gelassenheit in ourselves on our own > is letting-be a kind of passivity? perhaps a higher acting concealed in Gelassenheit? Gelassenheit beyond distinction activity/passivity > transition from willing into Gelassenheit seems difficult

motif.name: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY
motif.title: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY

HDG.CCP.linkedContent: don’t awaken Gelassenheit in ourselves on our own > is letting-be a kind of passivity? perhaps a higher acting concealed in Gelassenheit? Gelassenheit beyond distinction activity/passivity > transition from willing into Gelassenheit seems difficult

HDG.CCP.content: [math & science unfold man’s historical character] any examination that focuses on what is part of history must be historical > a broad sense of history, historical rests in Gegnet > nothing but wait for man’s nature [not realized in rationality of animal?] in releasement to Gegnet, which conceals its own nature > we presage [lookup] Gelassenheit as sought for thinking [no arrival?] > we will non-willing when we let ourselves into Gelassenheit of Gegnet
HDG.CCP.linkedContent: [math & science unfold man’s historical character] any examination that focuses on what is part of history must be historical > a broad sense of history, historical rests in Gegnet > nothing but wait for man’s nature [not realized in rationality of animal?] in releasement to Gegnet, which conceals its own nature > we presage [lookup] Gelassenheit as sought for thinking [no arrival?] > we will non-willing when we let ourselves into Gelassenheit of Gegnet

HDG.CCP.content: as release from transcendental re-presentation, Gelassenheit is a relinquishing of the willing of a horizon > this relinquishing doesn’t stem from a willing, except the occasion for releasing oneself to Gegnet “requires a trace of willing” > this trace vanishes while releasing oneself & is completely extinguished in Gelassenheit [annihilation of trace or absolute ash?]
HDG.CCP.linkedContent: as release from transcendental re-presentation, Gelassenheit is a relinquishing of the willing of a horizon > this relinquishing doesn’t stem from a willing, except the occasion for releasing oneself to Gegnet “requires a trace of willing” > this trace vanishes while releasing oneself & is completely extinguished in Gelassenheit [annihilation of trace or absolute ash?]

HDG.CCP.content: [will as cause & effect] every will wants to actualize, have actuality as its element > the risk that Gelassenheit sounds like the denial of the will to live [Schopenhauer] > power of action & resolve also reign in Gelassenheit [these will mistakenly seem to pertain to will]
HDG.CCP.linkedContent: [will as cause & effect] every will wants to actualize, have actuality as its element > the risk that Gelassenheit sounds like the denial of the will to live [Schopenhauer] > power of action & resolve also reign in Gelassenheit [these will mistakenly seem to pertain to will]

HDG.CCP.content: steadfastness (Ausdauer) hidden in Gelassenheit: Gelassenheit becomes increasingly clearer about its inner nature, being steadfast, stands w/in this > the composure (Verhaltenheit) of Gelassenheit > could correspond to highest willing, but could not > “in-dwelling (Inständigkeit)”
HDG.CCP.linkedContent: steadfastness (Ausdauer) hidden in Gelassenheit: Gelassenheit becomes increasingly clearer about its inner nature, being steadfast, stands w/in this > the composure (Verhaltenheit) of Gelassenheit > could correspond to highest willing, but could not > “in-dwelling (Inständigkeit)”

HDG.CCP.content: abiding in his origin, man drawn to what is noble (in his nature): presentiment (Vermuten) of the noble mind > patience extends the furthest, waits the longest [arrival?] > [summary] “a patient noble-mindedness would be pure resting in itself of that willing, which, renouncing willing, has released itself to what is not will” > that which thanks for being allowed to thank [thanks nothing]
HDG.CCP.linkedContent: abiding in his origin, man drawn to what is noble (in his nature): presentiment (Vermuten) of the noble mind > patience extends the furthest, waits the longest [arrival?] > [summary] “a patient noble-mindedness would be pure resting in itself of that willing, which, renouncing willing, has released itself to what is not will” > that which thanks for being allowed to thank [thanks nothing]

HDG.DL.content: word of Japaner still withheld, will bring us an unexpected surprise (unverhoffte Überraschung)
HDG.DL.linkedContent: word of Japaner still withheld, will bring us an unexpected surprise (unverhoffte Überraschung)

HDG.DL.content: [back to path of question of hermeneutics] hermeneutics als Beiwort to “phenomenology,” means the interpretation itself [not hermeneutics usual meaning] > explaining etymology of hermeneutics will help clarify Heidegger’s intention (Absicht) w/ experiment (Versuch) of phenomenology > Japaner points out Heidegger has now dropped both words [along his path] > not done to deny phenomenology, but to abandon (lassen) my path of thinking to namelessness > which can’t be successful > because public requires rubric (Titel)
HDG.DL.linkedContent: [back to path of question of hermeneutics] hermeneutics als Beiwort to “phenomenology,” means the interpretation itself [not hermeneutics usual meaning] > explaining etymology of hermeneutics will help clarify Heidegger’s intention (Absicht) w/ experiment (Versuch) of phenomenology > Japaner points out Heidegger has now dropped both words [along his path] > not done to deny phenomenology, but to abandon (lassen) my path of thinking to namelessness > which can’t be successful > because public requires rubric (Titel)

HDG.DL.content: since Being and Time, bring out Being of beings (not in metaphysical manner [overcoming metaphysics]), so Being itself will shine out: the presence of present things (Anwesen des Anwesenden), two-fold of two in their simple oneness (Einfalt) > language: the prevailing (Vorwaltende) and bearing up (Tragende) in relation (Bezug) of human nature to two-fold > man realizes (west) [his nature] as man by corresponding (entspricht) to the call (Zuspruch) [promise?] of two-fold, bears witness (bekundet) to two-fold in its message (Botschaft)

HDG.DL.content: each man, each instant, in dialogue w/ forbears, perhaps even more, and more hidden, w/ those who will come after (Nachkommen) [inheritance, promise, future full of ghosts]
HDG.DL.linkedContent: each man, each instant, in dialogue w/ forbears, perhaps even more, and more hidden, w/ those who will come after (Nachkommen) [inheritance, promise, future full of ghosts]

HDG.DL.content: no answer will help us, must see (erblicken) appearance as reality (Wesen) of presence (Anwesen) in its essential origin (Wesensherkunft) [no refutation of Greek thought]
HDG.DL.linkedContent: no answer will help us, must see (erblicken) appearance as reality (Wesen) of presence (Anwesen) in its essential origin (Wesensherkunft) [no refutation of Greek thought]

HDG.DL.content: in Japanese, mystery is a mystery when it doesn’t come out that mystery is at work (waltet) [reigns?] [those in a hurry will never notice, slow down] > to guard purity of mystery’s wellspring, hardest of all > but we must incessantly strive to speak about (über) language, though almost (fast) inevitably such speaking turns language into an object (Gegenstand) > p. 51 that would be a position above language, wouldn’t hear from it, would only speak from language

motif.name: UNSCATHED / SAFE / SACRED / GUARD / SECURITY / KEEP
motif.title: UNSCATHED / SAFE / SACRED / GUARD / SECURITY / KEEP

motif.name: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE
motif.title: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE

HDG.DL.linkedContent: in Japanese, mystery is a mystery when it doesn’t come out that mystery is at work (waltet) [reigns?] [those in a hurry will never notice, slow down] > to guard purity of mystery’s wellspring, hardest of all > but we must incessantly strive to speak about (über) language, though almost (fast) inevitably such speaking turns language into an object (Gegenstand) > p. 51 that would be a position above language, wouldn’t hear from it, would only speak from language

HDG.DL.content: is the dialogue from out of the nature of language? mustn’t it first enter into a hearing that at once (sogleich) reaches (einzulassen) essence of language? > Heidegger once called this strange relation hermeneutic circle, exists wherever relation of message & message-bearer prevails (waltet) > message-bearer must come from message, but also must have gone toward it [affirm man’s habit, attention to Being, etc.] > but Heidegger will abandon circle, talk of it is always superficial p. 52 reach a corresponding saying of language [rather than speak about hermeneutic circle]

motif.title: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE

HDG.DL.content: [on dialogue, that it must always remain coming, never arrive, and there will be much silence, but not the obnoxiousness of talking about silence]
HDG.DL.linkedContent: [on dialogue, that it must always remain coming, never arrive, and there will be much silence, but not the obnoxiousness of talking about silence]

HDG.LP.content: stones gather soothing power (Besänftigende), pain stills toward Wesenshafte > gentleness (Sanfte), of blue, transmutes (verwandelt) discord (Zwietracht) by absorbing (verwindet) [?] into appeased pain (beruhigten Schmerz)
HDG.LP.linkedContent: stones gather soothing power (Besänftigende), pain stills toward Wesenshafte > gentleness (Sanfte), of blue, transmutes (verwandelt) discord (Zwietracht) by absorbing (verwindet) [?] into appeased pain (beruhigten Schmerz)

HDG.LP.content: in Trakl, “the boy’s blue voice retrieves (zurückholt) something forgotten and fore-tells (vorsagt) it” [cf. youth in Evening Conversations] [p. 178 earliness of long since dead promises “springtime of the soul”]> the boy? Elis, the stranger called to go under (Elis different from Trakl, like Zarathustra different from Nietzsche) > Elis goes down into uralte Frühe, older than decomposing Geschlecht, older because more mindful (sinnender), more mindful because more still, more still because self-stilling > boy Elis shelters/stores gentle two-fold of sex [sexual difference not in discord of duality]

motif.name: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)
motif.title: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)

HDG.LP.linkedContent: in Trakl, “the boy’s blue voice retrieves (zurückholt) something forgotten and fore-tells (vorsagt) it” [cf. youth in Evening Conversations] [p. 178 earliness of long since dead promises “springtime of the soul”]> the boy? Elis, the stranger called to go under (Elis different from Trakl, like Zarathustra different from Nietzsche) > Elis goes down into uralte Frühe, older than decomposing Geschlecht, older because more mindful (sinnender), more mindful because more still, more still because self-stilling > boy Elis shelters/stores gentle two-fold of sex [sexual difference not in discord of duality]

HDG.LP.content: flaming pain tears away, its rending (Fortriss) consigns [marks?] (einzeichnet) wandering soul to conjunction (Fuge) of storm [heaven]/hunt [God] > would seem pain’s rending would overwhelm (überwältigen), rather than letting soul prevail (walten) in veiling radiance > but! [here is Heidegger’s refusal of differance], the beholding vision (Anschauen) can rejoin (fügt zurück) the flaming sweep (flammenden Fortriss) to the fitting submission (Fügsame) of seeing acceptance (schaunden Hinnehmens) [moral image of thought], der Rückriss im Schmerz, pain achieves its mildness, its power (Walten) to convey/disclose
HDG.LP.linkedContent: flaming pain tears away, its rending (Fortriss) consigns [marks?] (einzeichnet) wandering soul to conjunction (Fuge) of storm [heaven]/hunt [God] > would seem pain’s rending would overwhelm (überwältigen), rather than letting soul prevail (walten) in veiling radiance > but! [here is Heidegger’s refusal of differance], the beholding vision (Anschauen) can rejoin (fügt zurück) the flaming sweep (flammenden Fortriss) to the fitting submission (Fügsame) of seeing acceptance (schaunden Hinnehmens) [moral image of thought], der Rückriss im Schmerz, pain achieves its mildness, its power (Walten) to convey/disclose

HDG.LP.content: the way apartness flames, it is spirit & thus gathering power, Das Versammelnde der Abgeschiedenheit, saves the unborn beyond the used-up for a coming rebirth of mankind, gathering power, spirit of gentleness, stills spirit of evil

HDG.WL.content: to reflect on language qua language, abandon traditional procedure, no longer look for general notions (Vorstellungen) (energy, activity, labor, power of spirit, world view, expression) > explaining language by way of something else, running away (wegzuflüchten) from it > “the way to language intends to let language be experienced as language”

motif.title: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE

HDG.WL.linkedContent: to reflect on language qua language, abandon traditional procedure, no longer look for general notions (Vorstellungen) (energy, activity, labor, power of spirit, world view, expression) > explaining language by way of something else, running away (wegzuflüchten) from it > “the way to language intends to let language be experienced as language”

HDG.WL.content: Heidegger will call the unity of language: Aufriss (design rift), name demands we see proper of language’s essence more clearly > [English translator offers etymology of “sign” in design, Latin signum, secare, to cut] riss like ritzen (carve), to cut a furrow in soil, open to seed/growth > Auf-riss the whole of the traits (Züge) that structures & prevails throughout (durchfügt) the open/freedom of language > Aufriss the drawing/outline (Zeichnung) of language, structure (Gefüge) of a show/indication (Zeigens) in which speakers/speaking, spoken/unspoken, are joined (verfugt)

motif.title: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)

HDG.WL.content: Aufriss of language will remain veiled if we don’t properly attend (eigens beachten) to spoken/unspoken [so we can arrive beyond the veil?]

HDG.WL.linkedContent: Aufriss of language will remain veiled if we don’t properly attend (eigens beachten) to spoken/unspoken [so we can arrive beyond the veil?]

HDG.WL.content: we will call the Sprachwesen in its totality (im Ganzen)—Sage: the Aufriss pervaded (durchzogen) by all modes of saying (eg. the present or absent announces/refuses/shows/withdraws itself)

motif.name: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)
motif.title: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)

HDG.WL.linkedContent: we will call the Sprachwesen in its totality (im Ganzen)—Sage: the Aufriss pervaded (durchzogen) by all modes of saying (eg. the present or absent announces/refuses/shows/withdraws itself)

HDG.WL.content: a way (Weg): allows us to reach something (lässt gelangen) [arrival] > peculiarity (Eigentümliche) of language conceals itself > that we are allowed to listen, we belong to language, this belonging contains actual presence (eigentlich Wesende) of way to language [proximity to facticity of language] > essence of Saying will only make itself manifest (bekunden) if we attend (achten) w/ great instancy to what the foregoing Erläuterung has offered

motif.name: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE
motif.title: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE

HDG.WL.linkedContent: a way (Weg): allows us to reach something (lässt gelangen) [arrival] > peculiarity (Eigentümliche) of language conceals itself > that we are allowed to listen, we belong to language, this belonging contains actual presence (eigentlich Wesende) of way to language [proximity to facticity of language] > essence of Saying will only make itself manifest (bekunden) if we attend (achten) w/ great instancy to what the foregoing Erläuterung has offered

HDG.WL.content: to pursue Sprachwesen in thought, a change of Sprache is necessary that we can’t compel/invent, can’t just procure new words/phrases > concerns our relation to language, which is determined by destiny [how will language retain us in Ereignis?] : our Saying (always an answering) forever relational

HDG.TC.content: discovery of technology unleashed powers of nature as process of annihilation encompassing earth
HDG.TC.linkedContent: discovery of technology unleashed powers of nature as process of annihilation encompassing earth

HDG.EC.content: malice is insurgency (Aufrührerische), das im Grimmigen beruht (rests in furiousness) > essence of evil is rage (Ingrimm) of insurgency (furiousness conceals this rage, in a certain sense) > perhaps the will itself is what is evil > yes, perhaps
HDG.EC.linkedContent: malice is insurgency (Aufrührerische), das im Grimmigen beruht (rests in furiousness) > essence of evil is rage (Ingrimm) of insurgency (furiousness conceals this rage, in a certain sense) > perhaps the will itself is what is evil > yes, perhaps

HDG.EC.content: Nietzsche interpreted morality, the Platonic-Christian ethical doctrine, & its later secularized forms (rational Ethics of Enlightenment/socialism), as appearances (Erscheinungen) of will to power > Nietzsche didn’t realize that a will to power “beyond good & evil,” as realm of pure will to power, remains only counter-world (Gegenwelt) to Platonism > Nietzsche’s doctrine of “discipline and breeding (Zucht und Züchtung)” is extreme affirmation of morality > if will is evil, will to power is least of all beyond evil

motif.name: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)
motif.title: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)

motif.name: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY
motif.title: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY

HDG.EC.content: standpoint of superiority (überlegeneren Standort) an attitude that no longer pays heed (kehrt) to devastation: a will of aversion (Widerwille) forces us to morally evaluate devastation
HDG.EC.linkedContent: standpoint of superiority (überlegeneren Standort) an attitude that no longer pays heed (kehrt) to devastation: a will of aversion (Widerwille) forces us to morally evaluate devastation

HDG.EC.content: devastation (Verwüstung): everything (human, world, earth) will transform into desert (Wüste) > desert is already there, doesn’t accumulate little by little, is there in an instant (Nu), in order to draw everything to it, to desert-ify (ver-wüsten)
HDG.EC.linkedContent: devastation (Verwüstung): everything (human, world, earth) will transform into desert (Wüste) > desert is already there, doesn’t accumulate little by little, is there in an instant (Nu), in order to draw everything to it, to desert-ify (ver-wüsten)

HDG.EC.content: historiological reckoning a consequence of devastation, man rolls into nothing > nihilism only historically actual when abandonment of beings by being occurs: this abandonment still lets beings be [?] > Nietzsche did not grasp essence of nihilism, remained caught (gefangen) in it, his metaphysics prepares for complete, unconditional nihilism, belongs to process of devastation
HDG.EC.linkedContent: historiological reckoning a consequence of devastation, man rolls into nothing > nihilism only historically actual when abandonment of beings by being occurs: this abandonment still lets beings be [?] > Nietzsche did not grasp essence of nihilism, remained caught (gefangen) in it, his metaphysics prepares for complete, unconditional nihilism, belongs to process of devastation

HDG.EC.content: morally grounded world order will not ward off (gebannt) or end process of devastation > no matter the measures man takes, malice may remain Grundzug of Being
HDG.EC.linkedContent: morally grounded world order will not ward off (gebannt) or end process of devastation > no matter the measures man takes, malice may remain Grundzug of Being

HDG.EC.content: [can’t pass judgment on ontology of world-event] devastation comes forth from being, is a world-event (Weltereignis) that beleaguers (umlagert) the earth > person who passes judgment falls prey to quarreling/annoyance that gnaw at him, he becomes slave to self-righteousness (Selbstgerechtigkeit) [Nietzsche on revenge dimming one’s own eyes]
HDG.EC.linkedContent: [can’t pass judgment on ontology of world-event] devastation comes forth from being, is a world-event (Weltereignis) that beleaguers (umlagert) the earth > person who passes judgment falls prey to quarreling/annoyance that gnaw at him, he becomes slave to self-righteousness (Selbstgerechtigkeit) [Nietzsche on revenge dimming one’s own eyes]

HDG.EC.content: your experience of healing now heals me, letting us become those who wait > the far is near in the nearness of what is held in reserve (Aufbehaltenen), the farness (Ferne) of what is dear (Holden) > for those who wait, the difference (Unterschied) btwn near/far opens most purely > those who wait will guard themselves from hastening to know that which heals in itself

HDG.EC.linkedContent: your experience of healing now heals me, letting us become those who wait > the far is near in the nearness of what is held in reserve (Aufbehaltenen), the farness (Ferne) of what is dear (Holden) > for those who wait, the difference (Unterschied) btwn near/far opens most purely > those who wait will guard themselves from hastening to know that which heals in itself

HDG.OHF.content: hermenutics: wakefulness (Wachsein) of Dasein for itself (not conventional understanding) > interpreting is a being, a distinctive how of character of being of facticity, that belongs to factical life itself (facticity not the object of hermeneutics) > chance that hermeneutics will go wrong belongs to its ownmost being

motif.name: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]
motif.title: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]

HDG.OHF.linkedContent: hermenutics: wakefulness (Wachsein) of Dasein for itself (not conventional understanding) > interpreting is a being, a distinctive how of character of being of facticity, that belongs to factical life itself (facticity not the object of hermeneutics) > chance that hermeneutics will go wrong belongs to its ownmost being

HDG.OHF.content: Heidegger believes it is best [why?] to treat everything said in today’s philosophy as pure/incontrovertible truth, not interested in truth/falsity of proposition but what goes on in this philosophy before it becomes what it is (was in dieser Philosophie vor sich geht) [hermeneutics as prior to philosophy] > methodology/logic couldn’t produce proper explanation because it would be a theory in same sense as this philosophy itself > Heidegger’s analysis will reactivate (nachvollziehen) step by step the context of its actualization (Vollzugszusammenhang) [cf. Derrida], bringing into relief how the object stands in view, how it is questioned, looked at, how concepts are being drawn (geschöpft) from it: ein Anspruch ganz primitiver Art (a quite primitive kind of claim/demand): can’t supply a basis (Boden) for this analysis

HDG.OHF.content: [method, Heidegger now explains how the analysis will bring factical Dasein into view, e.g. uncover curiosity in its categorial-ontological character, see Dasein in presence of existentials showing up (herausspringenden)]
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: [method, Heidegger now explains how the analysis will bring factical Dasein into view, e.g. uncover curiosity in its categorial-ontological character, see Dasein in presence of existentials showing up (herausspringenden)]

HDG.OHF.content: “phenomenon” will become truly earnest matter if it turns that to be in mode of covering-up-itself (Sich-verdeckens) & self-veiling (Sich-verschleierns) [which constitutes object of philosophy] belongs to Seinscharakter des Seins [withdrawal of Being]: phenomenology in radical sense

HDG.OHF.content: character of being of care: absorbed (aufgeht) in its temporalization/actualization (Vollzug) > going about everyday dealings has character of carefreeness (Sorglosigkeit), world appears straightforward, self-evident, care is asleep: possibility remains that distress (Bedrängnis) will break forth in world > [Heidegger now racing to explain how curiosity (cura-curiositas!) doesn’t do away w/ self-evidence but reinforces it, thus care of curiosity covers itself up] > phenomenon of care, a fundamental phenomenon > (“I must break off here”)
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: character of being of care: absorbed (aufgeht) in its temporalization/actualization (Vollzug) > going about everyday dealings has character of carefreeness (Sorglosigkeit), world appears straightforward, self-evident, care is asleep: possibility remains that distress (Bedrängnis) will break forth in world > [Heidegger now racing to explain how curiosity (cura-curiositas!) doesn’t do away w/ self-evidence but reinforces it, thus care of curiosity covers itself up] > phenomenon of care, a fundamental phenomenon > (“I must break off here”)
